atAGlanceFacts.factValue: Central, Fireplace(s), Hot Water, Natural Gas

buyerAgent.name: Jim Walker CRS®, GRI®, ABR®, e-PRO®‚PSA

data.description: Subdivision with mature trees near Renaissance in Ridgeland and Highland Colony at the Ridgeland exit on I-55. Old Agency Village is tucked away but convenient to shopping, schools, restaurants, businesses and much more. Enter this spacious UPDATED 4 bedroom 2 bath, NO CARPET, wood flooring, 2200 SQFT, family room with 15 foot ceiling and floor to ceiling brick hearth fireplace, separate formal dining room and a kitchen with breakfast bar, plenty of storage, and SS appliances. The laundry room is off the kitchen and also has great storage. Did I mention a tiled sunroom/office/playroom that completely closes off and leads to the large patio in the privacy fenced backyard? The patio has alternate access as well. The 14x16 primary bedroom has a tray ceiling, jacuzzi tub, stand up shower, vanity, and two walk-in closets. The remaining three bedrooms are very spacious and the guest bath has two vanities. Custom woodwork such as detailed crown molding and framed bathroom mirrors, updated lighting, and 5 year old roof. Sprinkler system for yard and plants, and very nice storage shed in backyard. Washer/Dryer and fridge can remain with acceptable offer. Call today for your private showing!
